import React from 'react' import { motion } from 'framer-motion' import { AppWrap } from '../../wrapper' import './Header.scss' import { slideIn, staggerContainer, textVariant } from '../../utils/motion' const Header = () => { return (
Welcome To My
Personal Portfolio
) } export default AppWrap(Header, 'home')
